message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find invaluable.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you coming to the table. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $1,130,000.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations, and this price reflects its true value.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,110,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
